description: four-sided vessel with curved sides and curved edges; irregular mouth opening; panel on each side of vessel with horizontal bands of color with irregular top edges (like torn paper) in graduated shades of purple through lavender to pink at top; curved wedge-shaped elements at edges are black with pink, green, cream and blue speckles; black around mouth edge
marks: Signature and Sticker on bottom, incised: [MIYASHITA]
title: Hiraku asa (Day Breaks)
